Reading Group

The meeting takes place weekly during term for one hour usually on Friday, 14:00-15:00pm. See below a list of the upcoming and past meetings.

Upcoming Meetings

Date Moderator Topic
July. 3rd, 2020 Xutan Peng Cross-Lingual Natural Language Generation via Pre-Training

We are part of the larger Natural Language Processing Group at University of Sheffield.
